name: Les Guignols de l'info… le jeu !
summary: Les Guignols De L'Info...Le Jeu ! is a point-and-click game based on a French satirical TV program. You play as a new TV reporter who has just joined the WCI, an information channel. Your goal is to get the best scoop from famous people from various fields such as sports, politics, and movies. Your ultimate aim is to replace the main presenter, PPDA. The game does not have an inventory system; instead, you are equipped with a video camera that has a limited battery. You must record pictures and/or sounds that align with your mission briefing, but you have to make choices quickly as there are many characters to interact with and a time limit. The game occasionally includes puzzle elements, such as creating a "portrait robot" or selecting the right dialogue.
